channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Mac DeMarco – “Phantom”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the dreamy sounds of Mac DeMarco's latest track "Phantom" 😍✨ #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Jack White Responds To White House Calling Him A “Washed Up, Has-Been Loser”
item.description: 🎸 Jack White brushes off White House criticism with a rockin' attitude! 🤘 #RockAndRollAintDead

item.title: Everybody “Scream”: Florence + The Machine Ready New LP
item.description: 🌟 New music alert! Florence + The Machine are back with a bang! 🎶 Who else is ready to "Scream" with excitement? 🔥 #FlorenceandtheMachine #NewMusicAlert

item.title: FKA twigs Teases New Album Eusexua Afterglow
item.description: 🚀 Dive into the ethereal sounds of FKA twigs' upcoming album Eusexua Afterglow! ✨ #NewMusicAlert #FKA twigs

item.title: Primus Announce New Year’s Eve Shows Celebrating First Year with New Drummer
item.description: Ring in the new year with Primus and their newest rhythm master! 🎉🥁 Let's groove into 2022 together! #Primus #NewYearsEve
